resources.string: Device cancelled connection to server. This is possibly caused by a firewall or filter, but can also be caused by losing connection in middle of a server request. If there is a filter installed on this device, please allow the app to pass through the firewall or filter, or contact tech support for more help.
Device is offline. Please connect to the internet to view this page. It will then be available for viewing offline.
Device is offline. Please connect to the internet to view this page.
Error occurred. We are working hard to fix it!
Shows what music is currently playing in UAMP
The application has encountered an unexpected error.

Caller has a valid certificate, but its package doesn't match any expected package for the given certificate. To allow this caller, add the following to the allowed callers list:

<signature name="%1$s" package="%2$s">
	<key>%3$s</key>
</signature>
